**酒**（potion of booze）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种非[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")药水。[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")会将该药水称作**清酒**（potion of sake）[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

## 生成

[矿坑底层](/index.php?title=%E7%9F%BF%E5%9D%91%E5%BA%95%E5%B1%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "矿坑底层 (page does not exist)")的[侏儒王酒窖](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%8F%E5%84%92%E7%8E%8B%E9%85%92%E7%AA%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侏儒王酒窖 (page does not exist)")变种关卡中，会生成至少6瓶酒。

[熟食店](/index.php?title=%E7%86%9F%E9%A3%9F%E5%BA%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "熟食店 (page does not exist)")中每件商品有4%的概率是酒[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

将[果汁](/wiki/%E6%9E%9C%E6%B1%81 "果汁")浸入[加速药水](/wiki/%E5%8A%A0%E9%80%9F%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "加速药水")或[启蒙药水](/wiki/%E5%90%AF%E8%92%99%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "启蒙药水")可以将该药水[调制](/index.php?title=%E7%82%BC%E9%87%91%E6%9C%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "炼金术 (page does not exist)")成酒[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。将[混乱药水](/wiki/%E6%B7%B7%E4%B9%B1%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "混乱药水")浸入[获得能量药水](/wiki/%E8%8E%B7%E5%BE%97%E8%83%BD%E9%87%8F%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "获得能量药水")或[升级药水](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%87%E7%BA%A7%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "升级药水 (page does not exist)")可以将该药水调制成酒或[启蒙药水](/wiki/%E5%90%AF%E8%92%99%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "启蒙药水")[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

[使用](/index.php?title=%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "使用 (page does not exist)")有[充能](/index.php?title=%E5%85%85%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "充能 (page does not exist)")的[丰饶之角](/index.php?title=%E4%B8%B0%E9%A5%B6%E4%B9%8B%E8%A7%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "丰饶之角 (page does not exist)")有约1.4%的概率产出一瓶酒。

## 描述

[饮用](/index.php?title=%E9%A5%AE%E7%94%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "饮用 (page does not exist)")酒会补充[营养值](/index.php?title=%E8%90%A5%E5%85%BB%E5%80%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "营养值 (page does not exist)")，损害[感知](/index.php?title=%E6%84%9F%E7%9F%A5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "感知 (page does not exist)")，并有可能造成[混乱](/index.php?title=%E6%B7%B7%E4%B9%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "混乱 (page does not exist)")，具体效果取决于[BUC](/index.php?title=BUC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "BUC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")，如下[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)：

- 祝福：损害感知，提供30营养值
- 未诅咒：损害感知，提供20营养值，将你的混乱状态延长3d8回合
- 诅咒：损害感知，提供10营养值，令你昏迷1～15回合，将你的混乱状态延长3d8回合

未稀释的酒还会[治疗](/index.php?title=%E6%B2%BB%E7%96%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "治疗 (page does not exist)")1点[生命值](/index.php?title=%E7%94%9F%E5%91%BD%E5%80%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "生命值 (page does not exist)")。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

现在酒造成的混乱状态时长取决于饮用者的饱腹度：如果玩家处于“饱腹”状态，则酒造成的混乱状态为2d8回合，在此基础上，玩家的饥饿等级每低一级，饮用酒造成的混乱时长便增加d8回合。

用酒击中怪物会令其混乱，该效果会被[怪物魔抗](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E9%AD%94%E6%8A%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物魔抗 (page does not exist)")抵抗[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。吸入酒的[蒸汽](/index.php?title=%E8%92%B8%E6%B1%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "蒸汽 (page does not exist)")会让你的混乱状态延长d5回合[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)。怪物在常规情况下不会投掷酒来攻击。将酒和[升级药水](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%87%E7%BA%A7%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "升级药水 (page does not exist)")或[获得能量药水](/wiki/%E8%8E%B7%E5%BE%97%E8%83%BD%E9%87%8F%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "获得能量药水")[混合](/index.php?title=%E7%82%BC%E9%87%91%E6%9C%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "炼金术 (page does not exist)")会制造出[幻觉药水](/wiki/%E5%B9%BB%E8%A7%89%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "幻觉药水")[\[9\]](#cite_note-9)。将酒与[启蒙药水](/wiki/%E5%90%AF%E8%92%99%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "启蒙药水")混合会制造出[混乱药水](/wiki/%E6%B7%B7%E4%B9%B1%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "混乱药水")[\[10\]](#cite_note-10)。

将[紫水晶](/index.php?title=%E7%B4%AB%E6%B0%B4%E6%99%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "紫水晶 (page does not exist)")浸入酒会将其转化成[果汁](/wiki/%E6%9E%9C%E6%B1%81 "果汁")[\[11\]](#cite_note-11)。更多信息请参阅[紫水晶](/index.php?title=%E7%B4%AB%E6%B0%B4%E6%99%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "紫水晶 (page does not exist)")条目。

## 策略

未诅咒的酒有时可以用作混乱状态的来源，以发挥特定[卷轴](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%B7%E8%BD%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "卷轴 (page does not exist)")的特殊阅读效果，例如用[金钱探测卷轴](/index.php?title=%E9%87%91%E9%92%B1%E6%8E%A2%E6%B5%8B%E5%8D%B7%E8%BD%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "金钱探测卷轴 (page does not exist)")探测[元素位面](/index.php?title=%E5%85%83%E7%B4%A0%E4%BD%8D%E9%9D%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "元素位面 (page does not exist)")的[魔法传送门](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E4%BC%A0%E9%80%81%E9%97%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法传送门 (page does not exist)")，或用[防具附魔卷轴](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94%E5%8D%B7%E8%BD%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "防具附魔卷轴 (page does not exist)")为防具做[防侵蚀](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B2%E4%BE%B5%E8%9A%80\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "防侵蚀 (page does not exist)")处理。祝福的酒对于挑战[无食物](/index.php?title=%E6%97%A0%E9%A3%9F%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "无食物 (page does not exist)")[行为](/index.php?title=%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "行为 (page does not exist)")的玩家来说是不错的营养来源。

## 历史

酒最初于[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")加入游戏[\[12\]](#cite_note-12)。

NetHack玩家中有一种传统：在飞升前将装满酒的[冰盒子](/index.php?title=%E5%86%B0%E7%9B%92%E5%AD%90\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "冰盒子 (page does not exist)")带到[星界位面](/index.php?title=%E6%98%9F%E7%95%8C%E4%BD%8D%E9%9D%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "星界位面 (page does not exist)")，为“[半神酒吧](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%8A%E7%A5%9E%E9%85%92%E5%90%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "半神酒吧 (page does not exist)")”作准备。这种行为在最近的版本中已不常见。

## 消息

- 啊！这尝起来像液态火！（Ooph! This tastes like liquid fire!）

  你喝下了一瓶酒。

- 啊！这尝起来像掺水的液态火！（Ooph! This tastes like watered down liquid fire!）

  同上，但酒是被稀释的。

- 啊！这尝起来像蒲公英酒！（Ooph! This tastes like dandelion wine!）

  你在幻觉状态下喝下了一瓶酒。

- 啊！这尝起来像掺水的蒲公英酒！（Ooph! This tastes like watered down dandelion wine!）

  同上，但酒是被稀释的。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Potion_of_booze/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Many variants associate [dwarves](/wiki/Dwarf_\(monster\) "Dwarf (monster)") with drinking, to the point of often generating them with booze when not encountered within the [Gnomish Mines](/wiki/Gnomish_Mines "Gnomish Mines") (with the likely-shared assumption that dwarves always mine responsibly).

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), dwarves have a 6⁄7 chance of be generated with a potion of booze.

### dNethack

In [dNethack](/wiki/DNethack "DNethack"), booze is far more useful as a source of nutrition - drinking it gives 130 points of nutrition if uncursed, 140 if blessed, and 120 if cursed, along with healing you for HP equal to your level regardless of beatitude. However, drinking a cursed potion will render you nauseous for 15+5d4 turns afterwards, causing you to vomit if not cured.

[Bards](/wiki/Bard "Bard") and [Pirates](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate") start with potions of booze. Dwarves encountered outside the Mines always have potions of booze, and [player monster](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster") [bards](/index.php?title=Bard_\(player_monster\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Bard (player monster) (page does not exist)") and [pirates](/wiki/Pirate_\(player_monster\) "Pirate (player monster)") can generate with them as well.

Quaffing potions of booze also raises [sanity](/wiki/Sanity "Sanity") by 5 points, as well as a second hidden stat explained below. However, once drunkenness is capped out at 3 potions per character level, drinking booze can no longer raise sanity above 50.

#### Drunkenness

dNetHack also has a "drunkenness" counter that tracks the number of potions of booze you've quaffed, which is capped at 3 times your [experience level](/wiki/Experience_level "Experience level")). If you are [stunned](/wiki/Stunned "Stunned"), or 1⁄5 of the time if you are confused, and you've drunken more than three potions of booze total, you have a 1 / (number of potions drunk/3 + 1) chance of *not* moving where you want to go. Your chance of moving unsuccessfully while confused is (formula) / 5 and equal to the formula while stunned. In effect, the more drunk you are, the less likely you are to stumble around while confused or stunned for any reason - this has no effect on your chances of *becoming* confused or stunned.

High levels of drunkenness allow [Monks](/wiki/Monk "Monk") to practice drunken boxing, and serve as the prerequisite for the [spirit](/wiki/Spirits_\(dNetHack\) "Spirits (dNetHack)") [Naberius](/wiki/Naberius "Naberius") (e.g., his 'taboo' requires you drink at least one potion of booze per three levels).

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), potions of booze can remove the [afraid](/wiki/Afraid "Afraid") status effect. Thus they are worth collecting and carrying around. There are many guaranteed potions of booze generated in the [Bar](/wiki/Bar_\(SpliceHack\) "Bar (SpliceHack)").

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), dwarves also frequently generate with booze, and may be carrying up to 3 potions.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), various roles start with potions of booze, and some of them :

- The Bard role starts with 2-10 potions of booze, and gains access to the "booze" technique at level 10.
- The [Chef](/wiki/Chef "Chef") starts out with some potions of booze.
- The [Drunk](/wiki/Drunk "Drunk") starts with 5 potions of booze; they gain an extra 100 points of nutrition and heal up to [rnz](/wiki/Rnz "Rnz")(20 + [experience level](/wiki/Experience_level "Experience level")) hit points per potion quaffed. Drunks also start with access to a "[booze](/wiki/Booze_\(technique\) "Booze (technique)")" [technique](/wiki/Technique "Technique") that allows them to simulate the effects of the potion, including the added benefits when used by them, and generates more potions of booze.
- The Pirate starts with two or three potions of booze.

[Incantifiers](/wiki/Incantifier "Incantifier") that would receive booze in their starting inventory have them replaced with scrolls of [food detection](/wiki/Scroll_of_food_detection "Scroll of food detection"), and [clockwork automatons](/wiki/Clockwork_Automaton_\(starting_race\) "Clockwork Automaton (starting race)") will instead receive potions of [oil](/wiki/Potion_of_oil "Potion of oil").

Player monster bards generate with five or six potions of booze.

## 百科文本

酒的百科文本和[沉睡药水](/wiki/%E6%B2%89%E7%9D%A1%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "沉睡药水")相同。

On waking, he found himself on the green knoll whence he had first seen the old man of the glen. He rubbed his eyes -- it was a bright sunny morning. The birds were hopping and twittering among the bushes, and the eagle was wheeling aloft, and breasting the pure mountain breeze. "Surely," thought Rip, "I have not slept here all night." He recalled the occurrences before he fell asleep. The strange man with a keg of liquor -- the mountain ravine -- the wild retreat among the rocks -- the woe-begone party at ninepins -- the flagon -- "Oh! that flagon! that wicked flagon!" thought Rip -- "what excuse shall I make to Dame Van Winkle!"

\[ Rip Van Winkle, a Posthumous Writing of Diedrich Knickerbocker, by Washington Irving ]

使用有充能的丰饶之角有约1.4%的概率产出一瓶酒。

描述

饮用酒会补充营养值，损害感知，并有可能造成混乱，具体效果取决于BUC，如下[6]：

  • 祝福：损害感知，提供30营养值
  • 未诅咒：损害感知，提供20营养值，将你的混乱状态延长3d8回合
  • 诅咒：损害感知，提供10营养值，令你昏迷1～15回合，将你的混乱状态延长3d8回合

未稀释的酒还会治疗1点生命值。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（NetHack 3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

现在酒造成的混乱状态时长取决于饮用者的饱腹度：如果玩家处于“饱腹”状态，则酒造成的混乱状态为2d8回合，在此基础上，玩家的饥饿等级每低一级，饮用酒造成的混乱时长便增加d8回合。

用酒击中怪物会令其混乱，该效果会被怪物魔抗抵抗[7]。吸入酒的蒸汽会让你的混乱状态延长d5回合[8]。怪物在常规情况下不会投掷酒来攻击。将酒和升级药水或获得能量药水混合会制造出幻觉药水[9]。将酒与启蒙药水混合会制造出混乱药水[10]。

将紫水晶浸入酒会将其转化成果汁[11]。更多信息请参阅紫水晶条目。

策略

未诅咒的酒有时可以用作混乱状态的来源，以发挥特定卷轴的特殊阅读效果，例如用金钱探测卷轴探测元素位面的魔法传送门，或用防具附魔卷轴为防具做防侵蚀处理。祝福的酒对于挑战无食物行为的玩家来说是不错的营养来源。

历史

酒最初于Hack 1.0加入游戏[12]。

NetHack玩家中有一种传统：在飞升前将装满酒的冰盒子带到星界位面，为“半神酒吧”作准备。这种行为在最近的版本中已不常见。

消息

啊！这尝起来像液态火！（Ooph! This tastes like liquid fire!）
你喝下了一瓶酒。
啊！这尝起来像掺水的液态火！（Ooph! This tastes like watered down liquid fire!）
同上，但酒是被稀释的。
啊！这尝起来像蒲公英酒！（Ooph! This tastes like dandelion wine!）
你在幻觉状态下喝下了一瓶酒。
啊！这尝起来像掺水的蒲公英酒！（Ooph! This tastes like watered down dandelion wine!）
同上，但酒是被稀释的。

Variants

Many variants associate dwarves with drinking, to the point of often generating them with booze when not encountered within the Gnomish Mines (with the likely-shared assumption that dwarves always mine responsibly).

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, dwarves have a 6⁄7 chance of be generated with a potion of booze.

dNethack

In dNethack, booze is far more useful as a source of nutrition - drinking it gives 130 points of nutrition if uncursed, 140 if blessed, and 120 if cursed, along with healing you for HP equal to your level regardless of beatitude. However, drinking a cursed potion will render you nauseous for 15+5d4 turns afterwards, causing you to vomit if not cured.

Bards and Pirates start with potions of booze. Dwarves encountered outside the Mines always have potions of booze, and player monster bards and pirates can generate with them as well.

Quaffing potions of booze also raises sanity by 5 points, as well as a second hidden stat explained below. However, once drunkenness is capped out at 3 potions per character level, drinking booze can no longer raise sanity above 50.

Drunkenness

dNetHack also has a "drunkenness" counter that tracks the number of potions of booze you've quaffed, which is capped at 3 times your experience level). If you are stunned, or 1⁄5 of the time if you are confused, and you've drunken more than three potions of booze total, you have a 1 / (number of potions drunk/3 + 1) chance of not moving where you want to go. Your chance of moving unsuccessfully while confused is (formula) / 5 and equal to the formula while stunned. In effect, the more drunk you are, the less likely you are to stumble around while confused or stunned for any reason - this has no effect on your chances of becoming confused or stunned.

High levels of drunkenness allow Monks to practice drunken boxing, and serve as the prerequisite for the spirit Naberius (e.g., his 'taboo' requires you drink at least one potion of booze per three levels).

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, potions of booze can remove the afraid status effect. Thus they are worth collecting and carrying around. There are many guaranteed potions of booze generated in the Bar.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, dwarves also frequently generate with booze, and may be carrying up to 3 potions.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, various roles start with potions of booze, and some of them :

  • The Bard role starts with 2-10 potions of booze, and gains access to the "booze" technique at level 10.
  • The Chef starts out with some potions of booze.
  • The Drunk starts with 5 potions of booze; they gain an extra 100 points of nutrition and heal up to rnz(20 + experience level) hit points per potion quaffed. Drunks also start with access to a "booze" technique that allows them to simulate the effects of the potion, including the added benefits when used by them, and generates more potions of booze.
  • The Pirate starts with two or three potions of booze.

Incantifiers that would receive booze in their starting inventory have them replaced with scrolls of food detection, and clockwork automatons will instead receive potions of oil.

Player monster bards generate with five or six potions of booze.

百科文本

酒的百科文本和沉睡药水相同。

On waking, he found himself on the green knoll whence he had first seen the old man of the glen. He rubbed his eyes -- it was a bright sunny morning. The birds were hopping and twittering among the bushes, and the eagle was wheeling aloft, and breasting the pure mountain breeze. "Surely," thought Rip, "I have not slept here all night." He recalled the occurrences before he fell asleep. The strange man with a keg of liquor -- the mountain ravine -- the wild retreat among the rocks -- the woe-begone party at ninepins -- the flagon -- "Oh! that flagon! that wicked flagon!" thought Rip -- "what excuse shall I make to Dame Van Winkle!"

[ Rip Van Winkle, a Posthumous Writing of Diedrich Knickerbocker, by Washington Irving ]
